video.title: K-POP Extreme Survival
video.synopsis: Seung Yeon decides to chase her dream of becoming a K-pop star and audition for a popular group. There's only one catch: It's a boy band.

episodes.synopsis: After her unorthodox style gets her bounced out of a prestigious music school, Seung-Yeon meets Woo-Hyun, leader of boy band m2, on the plane home.
episodes.title: Episode 1

episodes.synopsis: Woo-Hyun is furious at having to face a public vote to be part of m2 Junior, but Seung-Yeon and her friend can't wait to audition.
episodes.title: Episode 2

episodes.synopsis: Seung-Yeon gives Woo-Hyun a black eye after he picks on the members of m2 Junior, but he gets revenge by forcing her to do housework for him.
episodes.title: Episode 3

episodes.synopsis: The members of m2 Junior get a rude awakening at an autograph signing, while m2 is turned upside-down by rumors.
episodes.title: Episode 4

episodes.synopsis: A sudden kiss changes Woo-Hyun and Seung-Yeon's friendship. Later, Woo-Hyun discovers that the model for his photo shoot is his former girlfriend.
episodes.title: Episode 5

episodes.synopsis: While the members of m2 Junior plan their showcase, the group's leader sabotages the event. Meanwhile, Ji-Woo's grandmother is rushed to the hospital.
episodes.title: Episode 6

episodes.synopsis: Romantic complications abound as Seung-Yeon and Woo-Hyun begin to fall in love, rousing the suspicions of Seung-Yeon's friend, Ji-Woo.
episodes.title: Episode 7

episodes.synopsis: The ice finally begins to melt between Woo-Hyun and Seung-Yeon, much to Ji-Woo's dismay. Meanwhile, In-Young continues her own pursuit of Woo-Hyun.
episodes.title: Episode 8

episodes.synopsis: Woo-Hyun overhears Ji-Woo admit his feelings to Seung-Yeon. Meanwhile, Chang-Min uncovers Seung-Yeon's connection to Sunny Entertainment CEO Jang.
episodes.title: Episode 9

episodes.synopsis: Woo-Hyun and m2 Junior learn Seung-Yeon is a girl and CEO Jang's niece. When she pleads for understanding, Woo-Hyun throws her out of the house.
episodes.title: Episode 10

episodes.synopsis: When Seung-Yeon can't get Woo-Hyun off her mind, she pays him a visit. As they escape a sudden rainstorm at his house, their bond begins to deepen.
episodes.title: Episode 11

episodes.synopsis: In-Young is enraged when she sees Seung-Yeon and Woo-Hyun leaving his house holding hands. Meanwhile, Han pushes for both of them to leave m2 Junior.
episodes.title: Episode 12

episodes.synopsis: Seung-Yeon urges Woo-Hyun to announce that he's dating In-Young to deflect the scandal. Meanwhile, Jang learns that the scandal was an inside job.
episodes.title: Episode 13

episodes.synopsis: Woo-Hyun tells In-Young he's calling off their sham relationship, leading In-Young to threaten to expose the truth about Seung-Yeon to the public.
episodes.title: Episode 14
